testimonials.description: Our clients' success stories are a testament to our commitment to quality and service. See what they have to say about partnering with THEI.

list.name: Arga
list.quote: Since I started using forklifts from THEI, site operations have run more smoothly. The heavy equipment is durable and fuel-efficient. The 24-hour service is also very fast—whenever there's an issue, it's handled immediately. The aftersales bonuses are great too; my company's operational car gets free service from TJM Auto Care. I'm really satisfied with THEI!

list.name: Shambat Kumar
list.quote: Our forklifts work 10 hours nonstop every day. Usually, they wear out quickly, but the units from THEI are really tough. What makes it comfortable is THEI's technicians are diligent in following up, and there are service reminders so we never miss a schedule. It's my first time buying a forklift and I got bonuses like free coating, wheel alignment, and maintenance for our office car too!

list.name: Rama
list.quote: I thought claiming a warranty would be complicated when my crane had an error on site, but THEI's team came in just 4 hours and the service was completed with no extra cost. The coolest part is I also got a TJM Auto Care membership bonus for my company car. This is the first time I've found aftersales this serious—really salute THEI.

list.name: Richard
list.quote: At first, I just tried one unit, but it turned out to be efficient and the service was fast. Whenever there's a problem, THEI's team comes right away. Now I've added more units, and work feels secure. There are lots of bonuses too—even our operational cars get serviced. Amazing, I never expected a service like this in Indonesia.
